name: CrewAI_Delegation
observations: Delegation allows agents to assign tasks to other agents in the crew
Controlled via allow_delegation parameter at agent level
Default value in Kasal: allow_delegation=True (line 301 in agent_helpers.py)
In latest CrewAI versions, delegation is disabled by default for explicit control
When allow_delegation=True, agents can delegate tasks to other agents in crew
When allow_delegation=False, agents must complete tasks themselves
Code execution always disabled: allow_code_execution=False (hardcoded for security)
UPDATED: Default value in Kasal changed from True to False
Security improvement: agents won't delegate unless explicitly configured
Better control over task execution flow

name: Sequential_Process
observations: Default process type in Kasal (line 597 crew_preparation.py)
Tasks executed in predefined order
Output of one task serves as context for next task
Task execution follows strict linear progression
If agent has allow_delegation=True, can delegate to other agents
Delegation happens within the sequential flow
Process configured via: process='sequential' in crew_kwargs

name: Hierarchical_Process
observations: Mimics corporate management structure
Requires manager agent (manager_llm or manager_agent)
Manager oversees and coordinates all task execution
Manager responsibilities: planning, delegating, reviewing, assessing
Tasks not pre-assigned - manager allocates based on agent capabilities
Manager agent typically has allow_delegation=True
Specialist agents typically have allow_delegation=False
Process configured via: Process.hierarchical in flow_runner_service.py

name: Parallel_Process
observations: Supported in Kasal flow_runner_service.py (line 797)
Tasks can execute concurrently
Process configured via: Process.parallel
Less commonly used than sequential or hierarchical
Useful for independent tasks that don't depend on each other

name: Delegation_Configuration
observations: Agent-level setting via allow_delegation parameter
Can be overridden per agent in agent configuration
Default in Kasal: True (enables delegation)
Best practice: Manager agents should have allow_delegation=True
Best practice: Specialist agents should have allow_delegation=False
Prevents delegation loops in hierarchical structures
Configuration stored in agent_config dictionary
UPDATED: Default changed from True to False for security and explicit control
Modified files: agent_helpers.py (line 301), config_adapter.py (line 146), agent_config.py (line 214)
Frontend already defaulted to False (AgentForm.tsx line 109)
Users must now explicitly enable delegation per agent when needed
Aligns with latest CrewAI best practices of disabled-by-default delegation

name: Process_Selection_Logic
observations: Process type determined from crew_config.get('process', 'sequential')
Default fallback is sequential process
Flow runner can dynamically set process type based on string comparison
Hierarchical requires additional manager configuration
Process type affects how tasks are distributed and executed
CrewAI.Process enum used for type-safe process selection
